text: Velyesta’fifillezine la yecidune nikahan hatta yugniyehumullahu min fadlih(fadlihi), vellezine yebtegunel kitabe mimma meleket eymanukum fe katibuhum in alimtum fihim hayren, ve atuhum min malillahillezi atakum, ve la tukrihu feteyatikum alel bigai in eradne tehassunen li tebtegu aradal hayatid dunya ve men yukrıhhunne fe innellahe min ba’di ikrahihinne gafurun rahim(rahimun)
